sen.j: 稲富 祐秀（いなどめ すけひで、永正5年（1508年） - 永禄10年（1567年））は、戦国時代 (日本)の武将で一色氏の家臣。
sen.e: Sukehide INADOME (1508 - 1567) was a busho (Japanese military commander) who lived in the Sengoku period (period of warring states; Japan) and a vassal of the Isshiki clan.

sen.j: 祐秀は鉄砲術に優れ、当時、鉄砲名人とまで呼ばれた佐々木義国という人物から鉄砲術を学んだという。
sen.e: It has been said that Sukehide learned the art of fire weapons from a person called Yoshikuni SASAKI who was excellent at the art of fire weapons as to be called Teppo-Meijin (Master in the art of fire weapons).

sen.e: Later, Sukehide's art of fire weapons was, by making up its original inventions one after another, handed down as 'INADOME Teppo-Jutsu' (INADOME's art of fire weapons).
